projectInformation.researchProjectTitle: DTC-OSTI Infectious disease phase1 project (based on http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jtbi.2009.04.010)

natureData.exactNatureData: Graphs of the solution to various systems of ODEs Graphs of model output as a function of each parameter
natureData.dataOwnership: Collectively: Lucy Hutchinson, Adam Berrington, Kathryn Atwell, Ronja Woloszczuk and Islom Nazarov

dataDescriptions.DescriptionType: Each data file will have a section in the text file metadata containing accompanying information
dataDescriptions.metadataCaptureMethod: Currently needs to be entered manually as new data files produced. Should be possible to write a MATLAB script to write metadata to the textfile automatically in future.

DataPublication.reasonRestrictionAccess: Restricted only by licensing agreements to ensure proper attribution
DataPublication.persistentIdentifier: LaTeX report on GitHub contains preferred citation form.
DataPublication.metadataProvision: Text file containing metadata for all graphs LaTeX report describing our results

DataStorageBackup.shortTermStorage: GitHub repository associated with the account of Kathryn Atwell
DataStorageBackup.backupFrequency: Local copy of the repository is backed up on Kathryn Atwell's dropbox account, refreshed whenever I sync with the remote (daily).

DataArchiving.secureArchiveDate: No plans to move to a secure archive beyond leaving it on GitHub
DataArchiving.methodDataTransfer: No plans to move to a secure archive beyond leaving it on GitHub

FutureDataManagement.futurePersonResponsible: Kathryn Atwell (data is associated with personal GitHub account)
